game.name: Supraland
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 데모를 체험해보세요! 포탈, 젤다 및 메트로이드를 합쳐 놓았습니다. 탐험하고, 퍼즐을 풀고, 몬스터를 죽이고, 새로운 장소에 다다를 수 있도록 도와주는 비밀 업그레이드와 능력을 찾아내세요. 플레이 시간은 12-25 시간입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Try the demo! A mix between Portal, Zelda and Metroid. Exploration, puzzles, terrible combat, secret upgrades and new abilities that help you reach new places. Playtime 12-25h.

reviewHighlights.text: Can't believe that I never reviewed this! Not that it even needs yet another positive review though. This is absolutely one of the best and most charm...
Love this series. Fun mix of puzzles, action, and adventure. Reminds me a lot of Zelda games. Highly recommended for both adults and kids
